statements: SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT donation_id, donation_amount FROM donations;
SELECT donation_id, donor_id, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations;
SELECT donor_id FROM donations;
SELECT donation_amount FROM donations;
SELECT donation_date FROM donations;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT donor_id, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donations FROM donations GROUP BY donor_id;
SELECT donor_id, AVG(donation_amount) AS avg_donation FROM donations GROUP BY donor_id;
SELECT donor_id, COUNT(donation_id) AS donation_count FROM donations GROUP BY donor_id;
SELECT SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donations FROM donations;
SELECT AVG(donation_amount) AS avg_donation FROM donations;
SELECT COUNT(donation_id) AS total_donations FROM donations;
SELECT donor_id, MAX(donation_amount) AS max_donation FROM donations GROUP BY donor_id;
SELECT donor_id, MIN(donation_amount) AS min_donation FROM donations GROUP BY donor_id;
SELECT * FROM donations ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM donations LIMIT 5 OFFSET 10;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000 AND donation_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT donor_id, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donation FROM donations GROUP BY donor_id HAVING total_donation > 5000
SELECT donor_id, COUNT(donation_id) AS num_donations FROM donations GROUP BY donor_id ORDER BY num_donations DESC
SELECT AVG(donation_amount) AS avg_donation FROM donations WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT donor_id, MAX(donation_amount) AS max_donation FROM donations WHERE donor_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT DISTINCT donor_id FROM donations WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT MONTH(donation_date) AS donation_month, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_amount FROM donations GROUP BY donation_month ORDER BY donation_month
SELECT donor_id, donation_date, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donor_id = 1 AND donation_amount > 500 ORDER BY donation_date ASC
SELECT donor_id, donation_date, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donor_id = 2 AND donation_amount < 2000 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC
SELECT donor_id, DATE_FORMAT(donation_date, '%Y-%m') AS donation_month, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donation FROM donations GROUP BY donor_id, donation_month ORDER BY donor_id, donation_month DESC

SELECT donor_name, AVG(donation_amount) AS avg_donation FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id GROUP BY donor_name;

SELECT AVG(donation_amount) AS avg_donation, COUNT(donation_id) AS total_donations FROM donations;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email, donation_date FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id WHERE donation_amount > (SELECT AVG(donation_amount) FROM donations);

SELECT donor_name, MIN(donation_amount) AS min_donation FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id GROUP BY donor_name;

SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id WHERE donor_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id WHERE donor_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT donor_name, SUM(donation_count) AS total_donations FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id GROUP BY donor_name;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_donations FROM donation_records
SELECT donor_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donation_amount FROM donors d JOIN donation_records dr ON d.donor_id = dr.donor_id GROUP BY donor_name
SELECT donor_name, AVG(donation_amount) AS avg_donation_amount FROM donors d JOIN donation_records dr ON d.donor_id = dr.donor_id GROUP BY donor_name HAVING AVG(donation_amount) > 2000

SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT donor_id, amount FROM donations WHERE donor_id = 5;
SELECT id, name FROM donors;
SELECT name, email FROM donors WHERE id = 10;
SELECT * FROM organizations;
SELECT name, address FROM organizations WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM donation_categories;
SELECT category_name FROM donation_categories WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM donation_records;
SELECT donation_id, organization_id FROM donation_records WHERE donor_id = 7;
SELECT donor_id, donation_amount FROM donation_records WHERE organization_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM donations JOIN donors ON donations.donor_id = donors.id;
SELECT donors.name, donations.amount FROM donations JOIN donors ON donations.donor_id = donors.id;
SELECT * FROM donations JOIN donation_records ON donations.id = donation_records.donation_id;
SELECT donors.name, donation_records.donation_amount FROM donations JOIN donors ON donations.donor_id = donors.id JOIN donation_records ON donations.id = donation_records.donation_id;
SELECT donations.*, donors.name FROM donations JOIN donors ON donations.donor_id = donors.id;
SELECT donations.id, donation_records.donation_amount FROM donations JOIN donation_records ON donations.id = donation_records.donation_id;
SELECT donations.donor_id, donors.name FROM donations JOIN donors ON donations.donor_id = donors.id WHERE donations.amount > 100;
SELECT organizations.name, donation_records.donation_amount FROM organizations JOIN donation_records ON organizations.id = donation_records.organization_id;

SELECT donors.name, donation_categories.category_name FROM donors JOIN donation_records ON donors.id = donation_records.donor_id JOIN donation_categories ON donation_records.category_id = donation_categories.id WHERE donation_records.donation_amount < 50;
SELECT d.name, d.email, o.name AS organization_name, dr.donation_amount FROM donors d JOIN donation_records dr ON d.id = dr.donor_id JOIN organizations o ON dr.organization_id = o.id;
SELECT o.name AS organization_name, SUM(dr.donation_amount) AS total_donation_amount FROM organizations o JOIN donation_records dr ON o.id = dr.organization_id GROUP BY o.name;
SELECT d.name, d.email, dc.category_name FROM donors d JOIN donation_records dr ON d.id = dr.donor_id JOIN donation_categories dc ON dr.category_id = dc.id;
SELECT d.name, d.email, COUNT(dr.id) AS donation_count FROM donors d JOIN donation_records dr ON d.id = dr.donor_id GROUP BY d.name, d.email;
SELECT o.name AS organization_name, AVG(dr.donation_amount) AS avg_donation_amount FROM organizations o JOIN donation_records dr ON o.id = dr.organization_id GROUP BY o.name;

SELECT d.name, d.email, dc.category_name, SUM(dr.donation_amount) AS total_donation_amount FROM donors d JOIN donation_records dr ON d.id = dr.donor_id JOIN donation_categories dc ON dr.category_id = dc.id GROUP BY d.name, d.email, dc.category_name;

SELECT d.name, d.email, o.name AS organization_name, dr.donation_amount, dr.donation_date FROM donors d JOIN donation_records dr ON d.id = dr.donor_id JOIN organizations o ON dr.organization_id = o.id;
SELECT d.name, d.email, o.address AS organization_address, dr.donation_amount FROM donors d JOIN donation_records dr ON d.id = dr.donor_id JOIN organizations o ON dr.organization_id = o.id;
SELECT d.name, d.email, dc.category_name, dr.donation_amount, dr.donation_date FROM donors d JOIN donation_records dr ON d.id = dr.donor_id JOIN donation_categories dc ON dr.category_id = dc.id;
SELECT o.name AS organization_name, COUNT(dr.id) AS donation_record_count FROM organizations o JOIN donation_records dr ON o.id = dr.organization_id GROUP BY o.name;
SELECT d.name, d.email, SUM(dr.donation_amount) AS total_donation_amount FROM donors d JOIN donation_records dr ON d.id = dr.donor_id GROUP BY d.name, d.email;
SELECT d.name, d.email FROM donors d WHERE d.id NOT IN (SELECT donor_id FROM donation_records);

SELECT o.name AS organization_name, dc.category_name, SUM(dr.donation_amount) AS total_donation_amount FROM organizations o JOIN donation_records dr ON o.id = dr.organization_id JOIN donation_categories dc ON dr.category_id = dc.id GROUP BY o.name, dc.category_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_donation_records FROM donation_records;
SELECT d.name, d.email, dr.donation_amount FROM donors d JOIN donation_records dr ON d.id = dr.donor_id WHERE dr.donation_amount > 100;

SELECT o.name AS organization_name, AVG(dr.donation_amount) AS avg_donation_amount, COUNT(dr.id) AS donation_count FROM organizations o JOIN donation_records dr ON o.id = dr.organization_id GROUP BY o.name;

SELECT d.name, d.email, o.name AS organization_name, dc.category_name FROM donors d JOIN donation_records dr ON d.id = dr.donor_id JOIN organizations o ON dr.organization_id = o.id JOIN donation_categories dc ON dr.category_id = dc.id;

SELECT d.name, d.email, o.address AS organization_address, dr.donation_amount, dr.donation_date FROM donors d JOIN donation_records dr ON d.id = dr.donor_id JOIN organizations o ON dr.organization_id = o.id;
SELECT d.name, d.email, dr.donation_amount, dr.donation_date FROM donors d JOIN donation_records dr ON d.id = dr.donor_id WHERE dr.donation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT d.name, d.email, o.name AS organization_name, dc.category_name, dr.donation_amount FROM donors d JOIN donation_records dr ON d.id = dr.donor_id JOIN organizations o ON dr.organization_id = o.id JOIN donation_categories dc ON dr.category_id = dc.id;
SELECT dc.category_name, AVG(dr.donation_amount) AS avg_donation_amount FROM donation_categories dc JOIN donation_records dr ON dc.id = dr.category_id GROUP BY dc.category_name;
